overview: As Kattie Gold naps on a couch, lovers Paula and Gina Gerson enter the room holding hands. • Claire Dain and Holly Belle are spooning in bed when they are joined by the delectable Gina Devine. • Carla Cox, Naomi Nevena, and Alexis Crystal are having a fun girl's night in as Alexis and Naomi pose for Carla's camera. • Blonde Cayla is about to step into the shower when she hears a noise from downstairs that she just has to investigate. • As beautiful Nathaly enjoys sleeping in, she is joined by her loves Mia Manarote and Karen.
title: Love Triangle
